content:
the mind alone, this same that-than-which-a-greater-cannot-
be-thought is that-than-which-a-greater-can-be-thought. But this is obviously
impossible. Therefore, there is absolutely no doubt that something-than-which-
a-greater-cannot-be-thought exists both in the mind and in reality.
